data.label: Mera Peak Climbing
data.description: To stand on a Himalayan summit with a sense of great achievement, Mera Peak climbing trip offers the best opportunity to experience the thrill of high-altitude climbing.

data.label: Island Peak Climbing
data.description: Island Peak climbing trip fulfills the dream of every amateur and serious climber seeking the thrill of Himalayan adventure.

data.label: Pisang Peak Climbing
data.description: The Pisang Peaks in the Manang Himal range offer excellent opportunities for exploration and adventure, with a challenging western flank for climbers.

data.label: Yala Peak Climbing
data.description: Yala Peak is situated north of Kathmandu near the border of Tibet (China). It is one of the easier, lower trekking peaks, ideal for those starting their climbing journey.
